name: Fuhai Li 0001
content: Fuhai Li | WashU McKelvey School of Engineering Expertise Develops LLM-Graph AI foundation models and agentic AI for large-scale data integration, interpretation and autonomous scientific discovery Research Dr. Liâ€™s research interests lie in modeling and interpreting large-scale and complex textual-numeric graphs. His lab develops LLM-graph foundation models, AI agents and agentic AI to automate graph understanding and reasoning in real-world systems, thereby speeding up scientific discovery in a scalable, robust and trustworthy manner.
